name: tplink-lightbulb
description: Control TP-Link smart-home devices from nodejs

scripts.release: npm version patch -m 'Bumped to %s.' && npm publish
scripts.build: babel src/lib.js > build/lib.js && babel src/cli.js > build/cli.js
